update:
this game is playable after download you need a couple things though...

since the Game is "GAMES FOR WINDOWS LIVE"
you need the software so visit and DOWNLOAD this 
http://games.softpedia.com/get/Tools/Games-for-Windows-LIVE.shtml

install it, its a p2p program for gaming across "Microsoft certified" games...yea...i know-w/o it you cant play ANY game that has LIVE written on the box.

once installed you should be able to play from the desktop. If not, you will have to download the UPDATE that it provides which is labled as, "WindowsXP-KB938759-x86-ENU.exe" its safe for Black edition O/S- or  a non-legal version of windowz.
after that, the game launches asking for you to sign in.. you can if you want but you need to goto their website to reg a name, and keep it or pay money to change your nic..

SO...
in the game CREATE AN OFFLINE ID/ALIAS
then save and your set.

choose an hamachi server or friends LAN>

this is hard to use trainers for....
the engine is a bit different,there are some that dont work,and crash- anyupdates on that, post here.
